import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Preprocessing(){const[normalize,setNormalize]=useState(false);const[fillMissing,setFillMissing]=useState(false);const[encodeCategorical,setEncodeCategorical]=useState(false);const[processingMessage,setProcessingMessage]=useState('');const handlePreprocessing=async()=>{const options={normalize,fillMissing,encodeCategorical};try{await startPreprocessing(options);setProcessingMessage('Data preprocessing completed successfully.');}catch(error){setProcessingMessage("Error during preprocessing: ".concat(error.message));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"Preprocessing",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"section-title",children:"Data Preprocessing Options"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:normalize,onChange:()=>setNormalize(!normalize)}),"Normalize Data"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:fillMissing,onChange:()=>setFillMissing(!fillMissing)}),"Fill Missing Values"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:encodeCategorical,onChange:()=>setEncodeCategorical(!encodeCategorical)}),"Encode Categorical Variables"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePreprocessing,children:"Start Preprocessing"}),processingMessage&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:processingMessage})]});}export default Preprocessing;
